ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of the firm of accountants ERNST & YOUNG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario, to audit the affairs and to perform the annual audits of the Bank of Canada for the five fiscal years commencing on January 1, 2014 and terminating on December 31, 2018.
